trans-unit.source: Provides common functionality across communication protocols for creating <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects from classes that are identified as Web services.

The abstract ProtocolReflector class and its concrete derived classes create <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as Web services with the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceAttribute> attribute.

Each concrete ProtocolReflector-derived class generates <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects according to a specified communication protocol; ProtocolReflector provides common functionality regardless of the protocol.

An output <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> instance can be used to generate a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Write%2A> method or one of the available overloads.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> instance can also be used by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class and related classes to generate client proxy code or abstract server code.

The ProtocolReflector class uses the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute> to create a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> for each binding it identifies in the Web service class.
If that attribute is not present, the ProtocolReflector class creates a single binding for the entire class.

For each Web service method (a method in the Web service class appearing with the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>) belonging to a binding, a class derived from ProtocolReflector generates an operation and associated messages that are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> object.

Typically, a developer uses these classes indirectly through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class, instead of directly invoking classes derived from ProtocolReflector.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref> class.

When overridden in a derived class, performs processing before <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector.ReflectMethod*> method for each of the methods for a binding.
Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) binding currently being generated and added to the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) binding currently being generated and added to the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

Gets the default namespace, as identified by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object's <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace"></xref> property.

The default namespace, as identified by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object's <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace"></xref> property.

When overridden in a derived class, performs processing after [ProtocolReflector](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) has called the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector.ReflectMethod*> method for each of the methods for a binding.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object for a given XML namespace and the applicable communication protocol.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> instance obtained subsequently gets populated with objects that correspond to WSDL entities that are reflected from the input Web service class.

The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> instance obtained subsequently gets populated with objects that correspond to Web Services Description Language (WSDL) entities that are reflected from the input Web service class.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object for a given XML namespace and the applicable communication protocol.
Gets SOAP header message definitions to be added to the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object.
SOAP header message definitions to be added to the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object.
Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) input message for the abstract operation that the protocol reflector is currently generating from a Web service method.
The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) input message for the abstract operation that the protocol reflector is currently generating from a Web service method.

Gets the Web service method that the protocol reflector is currently processing to generate a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation to be placed in the generated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

The Web service method that the protocol reflector is currently processing to generate a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation to be placed in the generated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute"></xref> for the method that the protocol reflector is currently processing to generate a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation to be placed in the generated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute"></xref> for the method that the protocol reflector is currently processing to generate a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation to be placed in the generated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>
Gets the Web service methods belonging to the Web service class, as identified by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref> object's Methods property.
Web service methods are identified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>.
The Web service methods belonging to the Web service class, as identified by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref> object's Methods property.
Gets the abstract Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation that the protocol reflector is currently generating from a Web service method.
The operation appears as a child of the `portType` element in a WSDL document.
Web service methods are identified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>.
The abstract Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation that the protocol reflector is currently generating from a Web service method
Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation binding that the protocol importer is currently generating from a Web service method.
Web service methods are identified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>.
The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation binding that the protocol importer is currently generating from a Web service method.
Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) output message for the abstract operation that the protocol reflector is currently generating from a Web service method.
The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) output message for the abstract operation that the protocol reflector is currently generating from a Web service method.
Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) port that the protocol reflector is currently generating to contain a reference to the binding being generated.
The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) port that the protocol reflector is currently generating to contain a reference to the binding being generated.

Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) <xref uid="langword_csharp_portType" name="portType" href=""></xref> that the protocol reflector is currently generating to be implemented by the binding being generated.

The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) <xref uid="langword_csharp_portType" name="portType" href=""></xref> that the protocol reflector is currently generating to be implemented by the binding being generated.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the protocol being used.
The name of the protocol being used.

When overridden in a derived class, generates service-specific description information that gets placed in a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object that corresponds to a binding.
Gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionImporter> instance being used by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> instance.
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionImporter> instance being used by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> instance.

When overridden in a derived class, generates method-specific information that gets placed in a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object corresponding to a binding.
An implementation of the ReflectMethod method should generate information such as operation binding, abstract operation, and messages.
Method-specific information that gets placed in a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object corresponding to a binding.
When overridden in a derived class, returns the name of the binding that a method belongs to.
The name of the binding that a method belongs to.

Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter"></xref> instance being used by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter"></xref> instance being used by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> instance.
Gets the XML schemas being generated by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> instance.
The XML schemas being generated by the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> instance.
Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) service that the protocol reflector is currently generating to contain a reference to the binding being generated.
The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) service that the protocol reflector is currently generating to contain a reference to the binding being generated.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object currently being created to contain the binding being generated.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object currently being created to contain the binding being generated.

Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects that have so far been created and added to the corresponding to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> obtained through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector.ServiceDescriptions*> property of the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> instance.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector> class creates a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> object for each binding, with a distinct namespace, that it finds in a Web service class.

The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects that have so far been created and added to the corresponding to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> obtained through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector.ServiceDescriptions*> property of the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> instance.
Gets the type of the Web service class being reflected to produce <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects.
A Web service class is identified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceAttribute>.
The type of the Web service class being reflected to produce <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects.

Gets the endpoint of the associated Web service as a Uniform Resource Locator (URL), obtained from the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> object.
The endpoint of the associated Web service as a Uniform Resource Locator (URL), obtained from the associated <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> object.
